      • isOnRails

        @Deprecated
public abstract boolean isOnRails(org.bukkit.block.Block railsBlock)
        Deprecated. 
        Checks whether the Minecart Member or Group is traveling on top of a given rails block

        Deprecated: use MinecartMember#getRailTracker() or MinecartGroup#getRailTracker() for this instead.
        Parameters:
        railsBlock - to check
        Returns:
        True if part of the rails, False if not
